name: Venmo  - Rethought
description:
Venmo is payments app, trying to be a social media app. My first assumption is: Most users don’t scroll the feed because they could give a shit about their “sorta friends” from highshool request each other for rent and beer repetitively.


My assumption is, most users are in and out of the app in 2 minutes or less.


Venmo’s profit model isn’t based on advertising to its customers. So there’s really no advantage to Venmo to maximize impressions / follow the social media model of keeping people in the app. So why not lean into what you’re good at?


Strip out the social feed and lean into the efficiency. Make yourself the best payments app out there!


Make it so simple it's the ONE app that your Nana uses to send you money after you visit, even though you’re 27 years old for god sake.
